short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clubup Assets management for club: Live Lightspeed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows Lightspeed tee sheet users to see how many golf carts are available in the ClubUp system prior to allocating a golf cart to a new or existing reservation.  This tool checks the ClubUp golf cart inventory to ensure golf carts are available prior to assigning to a reservation.
